Title: Cavernous Capers
Description:
While we wait for Veritistrasz and Narvra to nurse the rest of the camp back to health, I thought we might take a short jaunt.

I sensed a cavern on our way here, and... I feel like I may need a bit of spelunking to take my mind off what just happened...

Fancy joining me?
ObjectivesText: Travel with Rupert from the Dragonscale Camp in the Zaralek Cavern.

Objectives.Text: Speak with Rupert to travel to the Buried Vault
